A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie was very entertaining and a treat for the senses. It was also a marked improvement from The Force Awakens. That being said\, it is still hamstrung by a lack of character development for the main characters. Luke Skywalker deserved more and better treatment. Rey is the lead character\, but this makes 2 movies with almost no development of her character and back story. And the Snoke character wasn't developed at all. The journey is more important than the destination\, but this movie seems to be rushing through some of the key parts when it should slow down and linger a bit. Some of the fluff could have been trimmed a bit to allow for richer story-telling.
